task.title: Save Current Layout
task.shortdesc: Save currently visible Session Editor layout for future use.

taskbody.context: From the Session Editor window, with views arranged in desired format:

step.cmd: Click the Select layout button at the top left corner of the Session Editor window and choose Save current layout..., or select the View Save current layout... menu item.
step.stepresult: A window will appear prompting you to give the layout a name.

step.cmd: Enter a name for the layout (usually reflective of the task you would use that layout to perform). Click OK, or click Cancel if you are unsure.
step.stepresult: The new layout will now be available in layout menus.
